sub_topic: Determining the length of a side in an isosceles triangle.
message_1: In an isosceles triangle, the length of one of the equal sides is 12 cm and the length of the base is 8 cm. What is the length of the other equal side in centimeters?
message_2: In an isosceles triangle, the two equal sides are congruent. Since one of the equal sides is 12 cm, the length of the other equal side is also 12 cm.
